summary: XKX Ecosystem - XKX is an innovative Crypto service platform,XKX ecosystem provides practical tools Kit for the blockchain industry. It consists of four applications, including crypto marketing dApp, audit detection dApp, blockchain crypto news system and XKX trading robot. Marketing dAppV1.0, Audit detection dAppV1.0 and News systemV1.0 have been launched. Marketing dApp inputs contract help projects, sends search requests to multiple Dexs, increases search popularity and gains trend exposure. Audit detection helps you determine whether a smart contract is a scam based on contract code and data analysis. Suitable for any users and projects in the crypto industry.An innovative platform to solve user inquiries, transactions and marketing more efficiently.
